polito.sdp2017.Components

Class IPCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • polito.sdp2017.Components.IP
      • polito.sdp2017.Components.IPCore

  • public class IPCore
extends IP
    This class is the derived one from IP. An IPCore has all the attributes of IP, in addition a driver path field is took into account.
